ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set contains the Cluster 3 STAFF-SA average power spectral density in the passband of the analogue receivers derived from the Automatic Gain Control signal.

This is measured in three large passbands with 1 s time resolution, for the axial component of the magnetic field, and the sums of the spin plane components of the magnetic and of the electric field.

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3 STAFF Magnetic average  power  spectral  density AGC
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3 STAFF magnetic average  power  spectral  density  in  the analogue  receivers pass-band derived from the AGC signal  parallel  (Bz) and  a  perpendicular  (Bxy)  component  to  the  spin  axis

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3 STAFF Electric average  power  spectral  density AGC
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3 STAFF electric average  power  spectral  density  in  the analogue  receivers pass-band derived from the AGC signal    perpendicular  (Exy)  component  to  the  spin  axis
